timeline.message:
improve(engine): make configurable retries when sending telemetry

- retries can be configured in engine configuration
- default is 2
- in case of failure, the command counters should be restored so that
  we send them the next time

related to CAM-12115

improve(engine): let telemetry toggle fail if scheduling fails

- else the user assumes that telemetry will be reported, but in fact
  it is not
- on engine startup, we must catch the exception to avoid that startup
  fails entirely

related to CAM-12115

feat(engine): make telemetry reporting period configurable

- default is 24 hours
- users can configure a different period via an engine configuration
  property

related to CAM-12115
